Trade/Device Name(s): FORA ADVANCED GD40 Blood Glucose and β-Ketone Monitoring System
FORA ADVANCED GD40 pro Blood Glucose and β-Ketone Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): FORA ADVANCED GD40/GD40 Pro Blood Glucose and β-Ketone Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for FORA ADVANCED GD40/GD40 Pro Blood Glucose and β-Ketone Monitoring System for quantitative glucose and β-ketone measurements in whole blood using electrochemical biosensor technology
Indications for Use Summary: FORA ADVANCED GD40 is intended for quantitative measurement of glucose and β-ketone in fresh capillary whole blood from the finger for single-patient use, and GD40 pro for glucose and β-ketone measurement in capillary, venous, and neonatal blood for multiple-patient use in professional healthcare settings to monitor diabetes control, not for diagnosis or screening of diabetes.
